suzuki reaction?

C-H activation算係Suzuki stille sonogashira等等coupling reaction既高階版
Coupling reaction最大問題係要有specific functional group做precursor 所以要synthesise左隻precursor先可以再做coupling
令到synthetic route長左 overall yield又會變低
加上整precursor已經有d難度
C-H activation就唔需要整precursor 只要有啱既catalyst conditions同partner就得
Tandem/cascade 就係一個reaction整多個C-C bond

7s 7p stable左 radius contract

Drug syn 唔撚係咁簡單
首先要有人係plant isolate d potential 有用既molecules 出嚟
又要有bio佬幫手identify 個target biomolecules
然後trial and error 咁撞出嚟邊隻藥work
撞完又要知 active 個 pharmacophore 出嚟
Medicinal chemist 又要 optimise 個molecule structure 而每一個structure 又可能有 唔同 total synthesis pathway
Syn 完又要比bio佬個邊 test 十幾廿萬次
最尾找到個optimise 既structure 又要由org chem 佬找個最好既synthesis pathway
但入面可能要靠 唔同catalyst (通常metal catalyst) 去做出唔同既 regio/stereo selective 先可以syn 到隻藥

成個process 係要靠勁多人 唔係淨係syn 野

Makovnikov巴打尋日果條CFCo(CO)4我諗到有更好既explanation
Consider charge and oxidation state
CF3Co(CO)4 overall neutral charge
-> (CF3+)[Co(CO)4]-
-> os of Co = -1
-> Co is electron rich and electron is donated to CF3+ from the metal centre
-> CF3+ is in sp3 hybridisation when bonded to Co centre, no pi backbonding is available
->CF3+ is highly electron withdrawing and readily accept electron pairs from metal centre
->more stable
